basics.name: James Jennings
basics.label: Artist | Designer | Generalist
basics.summary: Versatile designer with a strong foundation in technology and fine art. Currently a demonstration artist at Colart where I teach techniques and inspire creativity.

education.area: Bachelor of Science, Computer Information Systems

work.name: Colart
work.summary: Teaching fellow artists the usage of materials, painting theory, and workflows.
responsibilities: Assists with product management and marketing to promote sales opportunities.
Creates engaging  lesson plans and demonstrations for art techniques and painting theory.
achievements: Developes education programs using Winsor & Newton materials for live demonstrations, enabling clear visualization of painting techniques and increasing workshop participation.

work.name: IndySoft
work.summary: Created scalable user experiences across web, mobile apps, emails, and landing pages.
responsibilities: Created compelling content for various marketing channels including newsletters, print material, and videos.
Analyzed campaign performance using analytic tools.
collaborated with cross functional teams and contribute to product strategy in a fast-paced, evolving environment
achievements: Led Usability Testing on 4+ digital products over a 12-month period using Figma prototypes and Optimal Workshop, identifying and resolving over UX issues to improve user satisfaction  across web and mobile platforms.

work.name: Netrist Solutions
work.summary: Works closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and other designers.
responsibilities: Defining and designing interactive elements, animations, and micro-interactions.
Contribute to product strategy by identifying opportunities for design-led innovation

Created high-fidelity mockups in Figma for mobile and web applications over 12 months, expediting user feedback cycles by  and supporting cross-functional sprint deliverables aligned with business KPIs.
achievements: Developed wireframes using Figma for cross-platform project, ensuring 100% alignment with user flows and accelerating the design approval process to a weekly basis.

work.name: Kiawah Island Community Association
work.summary: Administered I.T. services to: firewalls & security software, databases, networking tools, server message block, and server deployment/management.
responsibilities: Mapped processes to holistically examine business flow and identify improvement opportunities.
Used strong interpersonal skills to assist clients and train them on technology assets in a nonprofit environment.
achievements: Working with internal and external teams, helped secure IT infastructure after a ransomware attack and assisted in implementing new security protocols.

projects.name: Fine Art Website
projects.description: E-Commerce fine art website I made to show case my oil paintings.
highlights: Implement intuitive navigation and information architecture
Created CMS collections for shop and works.
Integrated motion rich animations and designs.

projects.name: Part Piper
projects.description: On going passion project, creating a auto part management application.

projects.name: Art Blog
projects.description: Blog learning project using the MERN stack and AWS.
highlights: Made using MERN, vite, TailwindCSS and hosted on AWS
